Articles.Content: Might be of interest to some folks: [http://boingboing.net/2015/05/05/lunar-rover-operations-manual.html](https://boingboing.net/2015/05/05/lunar-rover-operations-manual.html)
I want a camera like that for KSP ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If the Constellation program was still on going, they should use Lego instructions for their lunar rover, assuming that it will be made of Legos and brought along for the trip.

"Ok, Now you have to open the package CAREFULLY."

"Yes, I'm starting to cut- Gah, stepped on a Lego!"

"\*sigh\* Now there are legos floating in the cockpit."
